Sure, here are the PDDL actions for the task "Clean Synthetic Hiking Gear":

(:action read_instructions
      :parameters (?ins - instructions ?p - person)
      :precondition (and (at ?ins ?p))
      :effect (and (read ?ins))
   )

(:action wash_gore_tex
      :parameters (?cl - clothing ?p - person ?wm - washing_machine)
      :precondition (and (read ?ins) (at ?cl ?p) (is_gore_tex ?cl) (at ?wm ?p))
      :effect (and (clean ?cl))
   )

(:action check_boots
      :parameters (?b - boots ?p - person)
      :precondition (and (at ?b ?p) (is_synthetic ?b))
      :effect (and (checked ?b))
   )

(:action clean_sliplargerbund
      :parameters (?j - jacket ?p - person)
      :precondition (and (at ?j ?p) (contains_down ?j))
      :effect (and (clean ?j))
   )

(:action wash_polar_fleece
      :parameters (?pf - polar_fleece ?p - person ?wm - washing_machine)
      :precondition (and (read ?ins) (at ?pf ?p) (at ?wm ?p))
      :effect (and (clean ?pf))
   )
